title: How many jobs will be taken over by Artificial Intelligence in the next 25 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all, you should know that Artificial Intelligence covers everything starting from Virtual Reality and Image Processing to Natural Language Processing and Chat bots. Generally, when it comes to claiming humans’ jobs, robots are considered as a threat, but now that social media and messenger apps have become ubiquitous, chat bots have become capable of replacing humans in various sectors. Here is a list of jobs where bots will replace humans in coming years: 5 Jobs where bots will replace humans, Build a Chatbots
